short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: absence.io - keep track of all your teams absences

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
absence.io is an easy to use online solution for managing time off. Create absence requests via web or mobile and keep track on all kind of allowances like vacations, sickness and home office.  Say no the chaos of manually written vacation requests and tedious excel-lists. Instead it supports you and your team to increase efficiency and save time!

The chrome extension helps you manage your absences:
- See todays and upcoming absences from your team
- Create new absences within the extension
